website_summaries.verdict: A probiotic formula that has earned a loyal following for producing notable results for dogs that suffer stomach issues from allergies to foods.
pros: Helps promote immunity and ease digestive issues caused by food allergies by rebuilding the number of "good" bacteria in the digestive tract
May firm stools and ease diarrhea in some canines
Can be purchased without a prescription
cons: Like other products in this classification, it may not work for all dogs
In some cases, digestive issues may worsen before they get better after taking it

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by my vet after trying multiple products for my German Shorthair Pointer's GI problems. He had Parvo and thankfully survived, but has had stomach/GI issues ever since. He would be fine some days and bad other days; refusing to eat and having severe vomiting and diarrhea. This product has completely put him back on track. As long as he has his probiotics every night with dinner, he is as happy and healthy as can be. I swear by this product and highly recommend it to anyone who's dog suffers from gastro-intestinal issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lazers

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16 year old Basenji who is a bit of a picky eater. I worried about adding a probiotic to her food in case it caused her to not eat well. The great news is she likes it. It doesn't have a smell (that I can tell- she might smell it) and it is very convenient to use with it's one packet per use. I think since she has been getting this supplement she has gained weight and her coat has improved and she looks just brighter all around.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased Advice Probiotic Nutritional Supplement for my older dog. He kept getting pancreatitis, and the get have us 5 day supply. So I decided to order it off Amazon. The past 2 months since I have been giving him this product, we have noticed a big difference in him going to the bathroom. He doesn't strain to go, and he finally goes everyday. He seems more happier now, and so far hasn't gotten pancreatitis again since we have been giving him this product for 2 months now. He goes to the bathroom normally. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Poohbear1983

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my doodle because the veterinarian originally gave it to her at the office after a serious bout of vomiting. It cleared the problem within 2 days. So...when it happened again I decided to check on Ebay. This product works! Our vets office charged me 30. for a week supply and I bought a month supply and still paid less money. If your dog has an upset stomach or licking the floor trying to vomit this product will help.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Prado

customer_reviews.title: Good Poop
customer_reviews.text: I use this with two English Bulldogs - they are not too picky with what they eat and both have challenges with loose stools. I use dried pumpkin to firm them up and add this to it weekly to make sure I am augmenting their gut bacteria. This seems to be helping the effort as I notice an improvement in stool quality a day or so after they get this. Your results may vary, mine have been good. I have tried many different types of 'biotics' and will continue to use this.
customer_reviews.author: irooster

customer_reviews.title: Fixed our little Bichon's digestive problems that had our vet stumped.
customer_reviews.text: Our Vet recommended it after all tests came back clean and was stumped. She told us to give this a try. This stuff works great. We were having a lot problems with our pooch's tummy and runny stool. After a couple of days of mixing this in with her food, she has went back to eating normal and solid stools. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaa

customer_reviews.title: Great for diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is really great for a dog with worms or have diarrhea. My puppy had hookworms and was battling diarrhea. The vets kept changing the food. From puppy food, to rice and hamburger, then they wanted to put her on Science Diet. I finally said, can't we try a probiotic? I knew that changing the food again was just going to cause more diarrhea, so I asked. They went with the idea and it worked perfectly. Within 24-48 hours no more diarrhea. Once the worms were gone, I weaned her off the probiotics and now I have a healthy dog with normal stool again. I recommend this hands down.
customer_reviews.author: John Lemmons

customer_reviews.title: These really help my dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these probiotics for my last 2 dogs, and they help significantly. Especially after a round of antibiotics. These help with occasional throw ups due to upset tummies, or grass eating as well. I’ll keep ordering. I split the pack and sprinkle on food once in the morning, and once at night. I can definitely tell a difference when using. Even hair shedding goes down to nearly nothing!
customer_reviews.author: MPAK

customer_reviews.title: Helped my sick dog
customer_reviews.text: PetSmart vet sold us 7 days worth for our golden doodle who had a dog flu. It really helped with bloody diarrhea so we bought the 30 days supply here for cheaper than the 7 day amount at petsmart. Our pup is doing great.
customer_reviews.author: R B

customer_reviews.title: It works well for my dogs issues
customer_reviews.text: My 2 dogs are picky eaters and this is the only probiotic I have tried that they will not turn their nose up at. I have had to change their food several times due to medical conditions and their own picky nature and this probiotic really helps them tolerate the change in diet without the usual digestive problems. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JIR

customer_reviews.title: works well for our puppy
customer_reviews.text: Like many puppies ours has gone through a few occasions when he had an upset tummy and related issues. This probiotic seems to work well for our puppy during those occasions and helps to get his digestive system back on track. I prefer the individual daily packets rather than a large container of powder which is more difficult to measure and can become contaminated or ruined if it gets wet accidentally. The packets make it easy to dispense the daily portion without additional utensils and making it more portable if you're traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged with the expiration date clearly labeled. Much cheaper than what the vet charges! My picky dogs love when I add this to their bowls every other day. They rush to gobble it down in spite of being grazers in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Singleton

customer_reviews.title: I like using this if my dog had an upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: I like using this if my dog had an upset stomach , but I only use quarter of the packet. I tried using this everyday , started with a full packet, as suggested. My dog ended up with and upset stomach , even when I lowered the amount I was giving him. I like using small amounts of this product for occasional uses when his stomach is upset , it helps get him back in track. I have a small dog (13lbs)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish a Vet would have recommended this Supplement years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I started giving this supplement to my dog 6 months ago. My dog is 12 years old & has had stomach problems and very loose stool since we got her. I wish I would have heard about this before now. A new Vet. we went to recommended it. More affordable through Amazon. It took 2 months of constant use, but no more accidents or throwing up over the place. I will continue to use this in my dogs food.
customer_reviews.author: Denise  Marie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic changed my doggies life!!! She was having stomach issues and puking daily, until I was recommended this product from my veterinarian. It started working almost immediately! I only add a half of a packet in her first meal, since she is only 10 pounds. Worth EVERY dime, and SO thankful for Advita.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Gwynne

customer_reviews.title: the best product for dogs with dietary indiscretions!
customer_reviews.text: If your lab is like mine, she is constantly eating stuff she shouldn't which causes GI distress. This product is a life-saver! It usually gets her back on track with one dose sprinkled on her food. She appears to love it although this doesn't say much as she pretty much eats everything.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Drake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to both of their diets
customer_reviews.text: This product has truly helped to settle my bc/husky mix's gi issues. His poop is firm, no more gas, his appetite it healthy and his ability to digest his food has been greatly improved. I sprinkle it on his food every morning and will continue to use it as a regular daily supplement. My 7 month old gets half a dose every morning as well. Excellent addition to both of their diets.
customer_reviews.author: kellyd

customer_reviews.title: My dog has head diarrhea ever since starting this
customer_reviews.text: Im not saying the product is bad. I'm just saying it doesn't agree with my 2 year old male boxer. Gave 1 a day for 3 days and he had severe diarrhea. just dripping out of him. I was just trying to give him something to make a firmer stool and this made it much much worse.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl brown

customer_reviews.title: Works For Our Chloe!
customer_reviews.text: Our Chloe seemed to have a bit of a digestive problem. A friend's Vet recommended Advita and it works well for her. Since she's a small dog, I only sprinkle a little over her food every day. It's well worth the cost if it helps to keep Chloe healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ann, Florida

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this did not work for my Pom at all !! I was excited to try it because the reviews are so good but it didnt work for him at all. I gave a little bit on saturday and a little on Sunday morning and by the afternoon he was so sick. I feed him the exact same thing everyday and the probiotic is the only thing different we did. I am glad it works for others but i will never use it again. My boy has such a sensitive tummy and he was miserable.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky B.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, seems to help
customer_reviews.text: My vet gave me 5 packets and charged me $25! Amazon is a way better deal. The powder was white from the vet. This Amazon order has a yellow/brown colored powder. I hope it is the same product. If so, I think it really helped my dog wirh her diarrhea and upset stomach. I will buy again if it continues to help.
customer_reviews.author: Nev Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps her poo looking like poo instead of watery plops from the black lagoon. Also, she LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Francie Nolan

customer_reviews.title: It helped my dog
customer_reviews.text: The big plus for me was, it's about $10 cheaper than ProPlan FortiFlora, and contains the same probiotic (Enterococcus Faecium) as FortiFlora, but it also has four other probiotic strains, including Lactobacilllus Acidophilus. It has indeed helped my dog.
customer_reviews.author: The5thbeatleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I will tell you how much my beagle and cocker spaniel love it. I received the package and left it in the living room in the box. I had to go and run an errand. I came home, and the box had been opened, and 9 packets were missing! No joke! They are okay...thank god. However, if you are wondering if your dog will like this? i think it is safe to say yes. Made them more regular, and solid poop! what a change. They don't get tummy aches anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: This helps keep them happy and healthy
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs with touchy stomachs who seem to think that everything is food. No matter how closely I watch them, they always seem to find something non-food related to eat. This helps keep them happy and healthy. The vet recomenned this- but wanted to charge me more than double. Now, I order it from Amazon and keep a supply around just in case.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahua had a stomach problem almost every other week, with his stomach sounding like an orchestra out of tune. Took him to the vet who recommended this product. It works miracle. The guy now is very happy, eating like crazy, and best of all, the price of the medicine. With Petsmart I paid $19.95 for ten envelopes in a box --with a wellness discount. This item brings 30 in a box for $20. You do the math!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, cheaper than through the vet
customer_reviews.text: This works well for my dog who has loose stools. My vet had recommended trying this or Purina’s version, and they both work the same for my dog. Easy to open packet, though it’s a little dusty so you have to be careful. My dog enjoys the flavor too, comes running when she hear me grab a packet from the box.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good as Purina Fortiflora

This seems to have more stains of probiotics and our dog ate it up when we sprinkled it on his food but it did not work and it actually made our dog's digestion worst. After giving Fortiflora to our dog his poop was firm again.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: I can only speak about an aging GSP almost at 12 years. My boy had never ever had any digestive issues until this year. I could not figur out what was wrong with him and his constant diarrhea. I tried Advita as an attempt to help and life is back to as when he was a puppy. Perfect! This product is outstanding and will help your dog if he has loose stools or digestive issues. Always ask your Vet. though but I don’t believe it causes any harm!

customer_reviews.title: Helps sensitive stomachs

He likes the taste of the powder, so has no problem eating his food after we sprinkle it on top. It has helped him to have more solid stools as well. We give him one packet daily and have not seen any negative side effects.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, not my first choice though.

I dont know if it was that she wasnt eating it all, or if the product isnt as effective as others I've tried, but it didnt seem to help with her runny stools( due to pain meds that's shes on) as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

I can give 1-2 packets a week during normal diet routines. If my dog it put on Clavamox (1 pill 2x day) I give one packet each day (1/2 packet x 2 day) - this helps keep my dog from having any messy stools.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver

After a few days they were noticeably better. After a week they were back to normal. They loved the taste and would gobble it down.

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!!

We tried it, played around with her diet, and she's in tip top shape. She's normally very picky, but we put the Advita on her food and she dives right in and devours her food.

customer_reviews.title: Of the 30 packets in the box, 5 were ...

He even had a three week course of antibiotics (Anaplasmosis...) and he didn't have any issues!! It's a mini miracle. I tried fortiflora as well, not to mention all kinds of different foods. But nothing has been as consistently helpful as this.

customer_reviews.text: I don't think this is helping much. I have ordered this product twice now. My Pug still has soft stools. I may have to put her on a low residue diet.
customer_reviews.author: valli Horwitz

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Great Dane/Lab does great on this Probiotic! Switched from the Purina probiotic as well as many others and Advita is the only one that really works! Gas and digestive issues gone! Combine with a high quality kibble for best results.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: my dog likes the flavor, and helps a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: my dog likes the flavor, and helps a lot everytime his stomach is upset! we don't use it as a daily supplement, we use it as a weekly supplement or whenever my dog's bowels are not optimal.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Even my dog thinks so
customer_reviews.text: It helps my pup stay healthy, and regular, while he's on antibiotics for an infection! Although for my shih tzu pup of 13lbs, he doesn't need one whole packet per day. We divide each packet over about 4 days. Doesn't seem to affect him with any weird flavors like other additives
customer_reviews.author: Steve O

customer_reviews.title: She gobbles her food down right away now and seems to like it. Her stools are formed and solid and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product really helped our German Shepherd as they tend to have stomach and digestive issues. She gobbles her food down right away now and seems to like it. Her stools are formed and solid and I see a much happier puppy. Best of all of course is the great price through Amazon versus the vet office!
customer_reviews.author: Eggs

customer_reviews.title: So fr so good. I give it to my dog when I ...
customer_reviews.text: So fr so good. I give it to my dog when I notice the first signs of softness in his stools. Mixed with some pumpkin puree it helps my pup stay regular.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: This product was originally prescribed by my vet to improve ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was originally prescribed by my vet to improve digestive issues my dog was having. She has had significant improvements and has no objection to eating it with her food.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Healthy addition to dog's diet.
customer_reviews.text: Our14 year old dog receives this with every morning meal. She is fed twice a day. Recommended by our veterinarian for dogs with sensitive stomachs. The stomach issues have stopped and she loves the taste.

customer_reviews.title: Working Wonders
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be doing wonders for my dog; she really had a bad stomach and this has helped her. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep your dog's tummy happy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving this to my dog for years. She used to have a lot of trouble with diarrhea, but giving her half a packet (she weighs 20 lbs) a day, mixed with her food, helps keep her tummy happy. :-)
customer_reviews.author: kriking

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My vet recommended it after my dog became very sick. Now he has normal poops and drools when he sees me grab a packet!

customer_reviews.text: I bought some from my vet and it was so expensive for a few packs. This is a good price and my puppy loves this on her food. Helps her a bunch.

product_meta.title: VetOne Advita Probiotic Nutritional Supplement for Dogs - 30, 1 g Packets
feature_bullets: Contains guaranteed amounts of four different live, active cultures (Enterococcus faecium, Lactobacillus acidophilus, Lactobacillus casei, Bacillus coagulans) and pre-biotic inulin. Also contains Vitamins A, E, and C
Total Microorganisms: 2 x 108 (200,000,000) colony forming units/packet
Helps maintain a healthy immune system and promotes intestinal microbial balance and health
Is highly palatable for dogs in an easy-to-tear package for pet owners
